sentence.text: The ability of positive regulation of B cell proliferation to promote proliferation and differentiation of activated T cells fueled present attempts to modulate this immune checkpoint to reinforce antitumor immunity.

entity.text: positive regulation of B cell proliferation

sentence.text: The data presented thus not only identify the yet unknown involvement of positive regulation of B cell proliferation/OX40L in ALL pathophysiology and NK cell immunosurveillance but also point to the necessity to thoroughly consider the consequences of modulating the OX40/OX40L molecule system beyond its effects on T cells when developing OX40-targeting approaches for cancer immunotherapy

entity.text: positive regulation of B cell proliferation
